summary: An evil force from a 1000 years in the future begins to destroy an idyllic paradise, where the citizens are in perfect harmony with nature.
cast: Pierre-Marie Escourrou|Catherine Chevallier|Georges Wilson|Anny Duperey|Jean-Pierre Ducos|Christine Paris|Zaïra Benbadis|Claude Degliame|Olivier Cruveiller|Jean-Pierre Jorris|Dominique Maurin|Jean-Jacques Scheffer|Jean Saudray|Frédéric Witta|Philippe Noël|Philippe Duclos|Joël Barbouth|Michel Charrel|Roland Lacoste|Chip Bolcik|Charles Busch|Glenn Close|Bridget Fonda|Jennifer Grey|Earl Hammond|Jill Haworth|Earle Hyman|Penn Jillette|David Johansen|Terrence Mann|Alexander Marshall|Sheila McCarthy|Kevin O'Rourke|Ray Owens|Christopher Plummer|Dennis Predovic|Paul Shaffer|John Shea|Teller
title: Gandahar
